text:
A dentofacial deformity associated with incontinentia pigmenti: report of a case.
 A case of IP in a 16-year-old girl has been presented.
 This patient manifested classic ectodermal and mesodermal anomalies.
 We present this case to illustrate a rare etiologic factor in the development of dentofacial deformities that can be treated in the conventional manner.
